about.title: Meet scUber
about.intro: A world first on the world’s greatest reef
about.body: Experience the best that Queensland's summer has to offer with a $5,000 holiday on us! Whether you spend it exploring our world famous islands, lazing at the beach or enjoying the best of our super fresh seafood and tropical treats, you'll be able to choose your own summer fun!

hero.title: Win a ride in scUber
hero.blurb: On the Great Barrier Reef Australia

entry.intro: To celebrate launch of scUber, Tourism and Events Queensland and Uber is giving one lucky person and a friend the opportunity to win a trip to Australia’s Great Barrier Reef.
entry.prize_package: For your chance to win, enter below and tell us in 25 words or less why you should experience the wonder of the Great Barrier Reef with ScUber.

form.heading: Tell us why you should experience the wonder of the Great Barrier Reef with ScUber in 25 words or less
form.entry_text: Why you should experience the wonder of the Great Barrier Reef with ScUber?
form.opt_in: I agree to the terms and conditions.
form.partner_opt_in: I agree to receive exclusive holiday deals, competitions and insider travel tips from Queensland.

unsubscribed.title: You have now successfully been unsubscribed.

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.intro:
Thanks for entering the competition to experience the Great Barrier Reef with scUber!

Subscribe for exclusive offers, holiday deals and local tips from Queensland delivered straight toyour inbox.

Planning your perfect next Great Barrier Reef holiday?

Find out more about the ways to experience this World Heritage-listed wonder below.
